name: Pancake Thrower
description:
You are a humble bear, enjoying your peaceful woodland life. The only thing that can threaten this peaceful life is the swarm of birds descending to attack your home. Fend them off with the only thing that can placate them: delicious pancakes!

Move with the mouse and fire pancakes with left-click at the birds. Hitting birds with pancakes will increase your score, while letting them make it to the ground will decrease it.
